snippet: Cuba is cutting back its hallowed free education system and moving students into more practical careers to reduce costs and fill needs in its work force.
abstract: Cuba is cutting back its hallowed free education system and moving students into more practical careers to reduce costs and fill needs in its work force.
lead_paragraph: Cuba is cutting back its hallowed free education system and moving students into more practical careers to reduce costs and fill needs in its work force.

headline.main: With Cuts, Free Education Is No Longer a Cuban Birthright
headline.print_headline: With Cuts, Free Education Is No Longer a Cuban Birthright
